events.message: I just received my order and unfortunately the product has a large scratch on the surface, which makes it unusable.
The issue has been categorized as a product defect due to the reported scratch and damage on delivery.
An agent has been assigned to handle the defective product case and will reach out shortly.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the damage to your product. I’m here to help you with this issue.
Could you please send us photos of the scratched product and confirm the order number to assist further?
I have attached photos showing the scratch clearly and my order number is 785421. Please advise on next steps.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement or a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement product as soon as possible. Thank you for your prompt support.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped by tomorrow. We apologize again for the inconvenience.
We hope you have received your replacement product and that it meets your expectations. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
The case has now been closed as resolved, please don’t hesitate to reach out if any other issues arise.
